summary: This document is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York regarding a call with Cindy Hopkins, a court reporter. Hopkins found an external drive containing the original transcript of a deposition, including a text file and an 'eclipse' format file, but it lacks a certification. The email notes the document is subject to a protective order.

persons.name: Cindy Hopkins
persons.context: She found an external drive containing the original transcript of a deposition in both text and 'eclipse' format, and will send the text file.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York
persons.context: Author of the email, discussing the call with Cindy Hopkins about obtaining an original deposition transcript.

connections.person2: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York
connections.description: Hopkins communicated with the AUSA regarding the location and status of an original deposition transcript.

events.title: Call with Cindy Hopkins about deposition transcript
events.description: Cindy Hopkins reported finding an external drive containing the original transcript of a deposition, including a text file and an 'eclipse' format file, but noted it lacks certification.
personsInvolved: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York

keyFacts: Cindy Hopkins, a court reporter, located an external drive containing the original transcript of a deposition.
The transcript exists in both a text file and an 'eclipse' format file (stenographic notes translated to English).
The version found does not have a certification at the end, and the ordering attorney also did not have a certified copy.
The document is subject to a protective order covering specific paragraphs (7, 8, 9, 10, 15, and 17).
Hopkins has not contacted the attorney representing the deponent regarding the transcript.
